title: Can't log in
body: I have been trying to log in for 20 minutes but it keeps loading at the "Authenticating" status then it says "an error occured" or something like that :(

replies.body: Did you try the connection suggestions? Did they work? Just wondering because they haven't for me...
I didnt try those suggestions, I closed the client then after 2-3 hours it let me log in, im sorry if i cant help you, maybe just wait :(.
Glad you got it working. My problem persists. Oh well...

There might have been something blocking your connection to those authentication servers. If you still can't get signed in, do me a favor and run through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure something isn't wrong there first!
